languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс витиевато ругается на незнакомом вам наречии низкого готического.{/n} "Проклятье, {name}! Твоя снисходительность к врагам Человечества... нет, именно к этой двуличной и подлой мрази переходит все границы!"

{n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс витиевато ругается на незнакомом вам наречии низкого готического.{/n} "Проклятье, {name}! Твоя снисходительность к врагам Человечества... нет, именно к этой двуличной и подлой мрази переходит все границы!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希以你听不懂的低哥特语方言开了口，仿佛连珠炮一般吐出一长串咒骂。{/n}“真见鬼，{name}！你对人类之敌的仁慈……不，你对这个两面三刀、卑鄙无耻的畜生的仁慈……简直是在践踏律法！”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希以你听不懂的低哥特语方言开了口，仿佛连珠炮一般吐出一长串咒骂。{/n}“真见鬼，{name}！你对人类之敌的仁慈……不，你对这个两面三刀、卑鄙无耻的畜生的仁慈……简直是在践踏律法！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix profiere un florido insulto en un dialecto de Bajo Gótico que no reconoces.{/n} «¡Maldición, {name}! ¡Su indulgencia con los enemigos de la Humanidad... no, concretamente con este despreciable y traicionero pedazo de basura traspasa todos los límites!».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix profiere un florido insulto en un dialecto de Bajo Gótico que no reconoces.{/n} «¡Maldición, {name}! ¡Su indulgencia con los enemigos de la Humanidad... no, concretamente con este despreciable y traicionero pedazo de basura traspasa todos los límites!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un flot de jurons dans un dialecte bas gothique que vous ne reconnaissez pas.{/n} « Bon sang, {name} ! Vous dépassez les bornes en faisant preuve d'indulgence envers les ennemis de l'humanité... et plus particulièrement envers cette misérable et fourbe engeance ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un flot de jurons dans un dialecte bas gothique que vous ne reconnaissez pas.{/n} « Bon sang, {name} ! Vous dépassez les bornes en faisant preuve d'indulgence envers les ennemis de l'humanité... et plus particulièrement envers cette misérable et fourbe engeance ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix flucht mit rotem Gesicht und in einem niedergotischen Dialekt, den du nicht kennst.{/n} "Verdammt, {name}! Eure Nachsicht gegenüber Feinden der Menschheit ... nein, gegenüber diesem heuchlerischen und widerwärtigen Stück Dreck überschreitet alle Grenzen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix flucht mit rotem Gesicht und in einem niedergotischen Dialekt, den du nicht kennst.{/n} "Verdammt, {name}! Eure Nachsicht gegenüber Feinden der Menschheit ... nein, gegenüber diesem heuchlerischen und widerwärtigen Stück Dreck überschreitet alle Grenzen!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、あなたが聞き取れないほど下位帝国語の低俗な罵倒を浴びせかける。{/n}「クソ、{name}！人類の敵に対する…いや、この二枚舌の卑劣で汚れた者に対して、お前の寛大さは限度を超えている！」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、あなたが聞き取れないほど下位帝国語の低俗な罵倒を浴びせかける。{/n}「クソ、{name}！人類の敵に対する…いや、この二枚舌の卑劣で汚れた者に対して、お前の寛大さは限度を超えている！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, çıkaramadığın bir Adi Gotik lehçesinde ağdalı bir şekilde sövüyor.{/n} "Kahretsin {name}! İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı... Hayır, bu ikiyüzlü ve aşağılık pislik parçasına karşı gösterdiğin müsamaha, tüm sınırları aşıyor!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix curses floridly in a dialect of Low Gothic that you do not recognise.{/n} "Damn it, {name}! Your leniency toward enemies of Humanity... no, toward this particular duplicitous and despicable piece of filth crosses all bounds!"

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
